content.text:
Let me help you construct the structure based on the target image using the block dictionary.

Block Analysis:
1. Target Image Structure:
- 5 total blocks
- 3 layers high at the tallest point
- Blocks from bottom to top:
  * 2 orange cylindrical base blocks
  * 1 yellow rectangular block on top of the cylinders
  * 1 blue cubic block above the yellow block
  * 1 orange triangular/prism block at the very top

2. Block Selection from Dictionary:
- Block 8: Orange cylinder
- Block 6: Yellow rectangular block
- Block 1: Blue cube
- Block 10: Orange triangular prism

3. Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 8 (orange cylinder)
    Step2: Move another block with index 8 (orange cylinder)
    Step3: Move block with index 6 (yellow rectangular block) on top of the cylinders
    Step4: Move block with index 1 (blue cube) on top of the yellow block
    Step5: Move block with index 10 (orange triangular prism) on top of the blue cube
}

This sequence will recreate the target structure exactly as shown in the image.
